title: how to open register account server PBE. i hate waiting so long
body: i want going on server PBE i don't see email send in my Gmail :(

replies.body:
Unfortunately, simply applying for PBE access **does not** guarantee an invite. The best thing you can do while waiting to see if you'll receive an invite is to continue to *actively play* League and to be a *positive force* in the community as a whole. Check our [**PBE FAQ**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) out for more information on the system.

Please let me know if you have any questions.

last year im play in my account max level 30.going to web in tab PBE.i have done step 1 step 2 and check in my Gmail not see inbox in Gmail new email from Riot to going link next step 3 and 4 :(.how to open i want going to PBE im from VN and go to work not time play LOL everyday :(

According to my systems, you haven't been accepted yet. As I said, you aren't given an invite to the PBE simply by applying, you'll have to fit the criteria during an invite wave.

There's nothing you can really do right now other than continue to play and wait to see if you'll receive an invite. If you have any other questions, hit me up again.
tks riot games.can help me remove all runes lv1 in my account SLAIN2 & chanrge color runes in list rune.not see color rune lv3 & lv2 in new client beta

I'm not entirely sure I understand your request, but if you need help with removing content from your account, you'll want to reach out in a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). One of our account specialists will be happy to help from there on out.
tks you so much.last year buy full runes lv1.i need time give more IP buy champ and runes lv3
